thread.title: Nicki Minaj and Drake Reunite Shortly After Meek Mill Breakup
thread.title_full: Nicki Minaj and Drake Reunite Shortly After Meek Mill Breakup

author: Jessica Bennett
title: Nicki Minaj and Drake Reunite Shortly After Meek Mill Breakup
text:
February 1, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
Nicki Minaj and Drake are undoubtedly Young Money’s biggest artists, and the crew is finally back together again. 
The “Anaconda” rapper posted a flick of herself and Drizzy for the first time in over two years, just weeks after parting ways with her YM brother’s nemesis, Meek Mill. 

The Queens rapper recently linked up with YM founder Lil Wayne for an NFL Network segment, which Drake happened to catch on TV. 
He then reached out to label President Mack Maine to set up a mini-reunion for the three of them, according to TMZ. 
Credit: Instagram 
Mack soon set up a meeting for the Big 3, with the Canadian MC flying down to Miami to meet up with Nick and Weezy. 
The “Only” collaborators reportedly haven’t spoken since they recorded tracks for Nicki’s 2014 album, The Pinkprint. 
A photo posted by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Feb 1, 2017 at 8:36am PST 
This is also around the time Nicki and Meek Mill became official, with the Philadelphia rapper starting beef with Champagne Papi soon after. 
This lead to Drake releasing his Grammy nominated diss record, “Back to Back,” where he took aim at Meek and his relationship with the super star. 

Quotables from the diss include, “I don’t want to hear about this ever again, not even when she tells him that they’re better as friends,” foreshadowing the couple’s recent split. 
He also alluded to Nicki wearing the pants in their relationship, emphasizing that she earned more money than the “Litty” rapper and had him open up for her while on The Pinkprint Tour together. 

What do you think of Nicki & Drake linking back up after two years? Sound off below.
